function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Conduct separate analyses for different contextual factors and consider country-specific influences on intervention outcomes.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adopting other nphis such as mass mask-wearing, patient isolation, and contact tracing","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing more public health strategies and addressing the impact of nphis on other health problems","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular surface disinfection and the use of self-disinfecting surfaces","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous testing and validation of the efficacy of self-disinfecting surface technologies against specific viruses","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of appropriate containment protocols and biosafety measures","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strict storage protocols, regular monitoring, and use of secure containment methods","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of appropriate containment measures, engineering controls, and personal protective equipment","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct validation studies to ensure the reliability of the test method","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict sterilization protocols and control measures during testing","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extend the follow-up period to assess coating durability over time","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adherence to strict biosafety protocols, use of personal protective equipment, and proper training in handling and manipulation of virus samples.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ensure comprehensive integration of nature-inspired elements and patterns into the design and construction process.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide easily accessible nature-infused spaces and consider the proximate access to natural elements.","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integrate biophilic design with advanced air filtration systems and ventilation strategies to mitigate disease transmission risks.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporating biophilic design principles in the built environment, providing access to natural light, green spaces, and natural patterns.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing ventilation systems and air purifiers, and enforcing policies for indoor air quality management and maintenance.","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of water features, use of water treatment technology, and adherence to water safety regulations.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular inspection and maintenance of greenery, pest management practices, and adherence to green building maintenance protocols.","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting interdisciplinary research to develop specific design strategies and guidelines for implementing biophilic design in architecture","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting qualitative and quantitative research to evaluate the performance of biophilic buildings and develop concrete metrics for assessment","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collaboration between architects, building technology experts, and finance professionals to address financial and technical aspects of biophilic architecture","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporate anti-microbial materials and ventilation systems in biophilic designs","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct qualitative research to complement quantitative studies, and develop new measurement criteria for non-physical elements","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Explore alternative approaches to measure psychological factors, such as surveys and interviews, and integrate qualitative data into assessments","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Expand evaluation criteria to include non-physical architectural themes and their potential impact on contagion, develop new assessment frameworks","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct thorough user group analysis and consider age, gender, and specific requirements to ensure inclusive biophilic design.","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilize sensors and monitoring technology to quantify exposure time and contact frequency, and integrate data into design decisions.","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collaborate with researchers and experts in environmental psychology to validate design concepts and conduct rigorous scientific evaluation.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and monitoring of plants, use of appropriate building materials","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of pest control measures, proper ventilation, and appropriate plant selection","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of energy-efficient systems, use of low-maintenance materials, and sustainable design practices","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement regular inspection and maintenance protocols for plants to prevent pest infestations and control disease-carrying insects.","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct thorough research on indigenous plant species and their impact on the local ecosystem before integration into building designs.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing proper ventilation systems and sanitation measures to reduce the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting comprehensive research to identify diverse biophilic design practices and their impacts on sustainability","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of subfields such as materiality, tectonics, mechanical systems, and mobility in biophilic design studies","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Critical examination and definition of ’nature’ within the context of biophilic design","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cultural awareness training, collaboration with local experts, thorough research on cultural context","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Involving community in design decisions, preserving culturally significant landmarks, creating alternative community spaces","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thorough testing and evaluation to ensure balance and sustainability in the built environment","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comprehensive material research and analysis to understand the implications of each material choice","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thorough research and evaluation of biophilic design elements","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Standardization of terminology and classification of elements","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"In-depth study and analysis of architectural design principles","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of ventilation systems and air quality monitoring","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of green spaces, wildlife habitats, and biodiversity preservation measures in urban design","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thorough monitoring and management of urban wildlife habitats, implementation of preventive measures to reduce zoonotic disease transmission.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of effective water management strategies, adoption of mosquito control measures, and community-based vector control programs.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Training and education for architects on biophilic design principles and their integration into sustainable architecture","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"}]}
